SEARCH
Package bankAccount

Class SavingsAccount_S2023_Group6

java.lang.Object
bankAccount.BankAccount_S2023_Group6
bankAccount.SavingsAccount_S2023_Group6
public class SavingsAccount_S2023_Group6 extends BankAccount_S2023_Group6
Savings Account Class
- Extends Bank Account Class
- Contains constructor for Savings Account
- Contains methods for depositing and withdrawing funds, as well as charging fees
Author:
Group 6: James Dermezis, David Rosoff, James Tomasuolo, Oscar Xu

    • WithdrawAmountValid

      private boolean WithdrawAmountValid(double withdrawAmount)
      Checks if account balance is high enough to withdraw the requested amount
      Parameters:
      withdrawAmount - the amount to withdraw
      Returns:
      true/false - true if after subtracting the withdraw amount the account balance will still be greater than zero. False in all other cases
